context.p: A window screenshot will capture an image of an entire program. This type of screenshot is quick to capture and usually requires minimal editing.

step.cmd: Set the Selection type to Window.
Set Effects and Share to None.
Toggle the Capture Cursor option off.
step.info: The toggle icon should be grey when it is turned off.

step.cmd: Toggle the Preview in Editor option on.
step.info: The toggle icon should be blue when it is turned on.

step.cmd: Click on the window you want to capture.

taskbody.result: Snagit Editor will open up and display the screenshot you captured.
